results.title: Effect of beta-adrenergic blockade on hyperventilation and exercise tolerance in emphysema.
results.journal: J Appl Physiol Respir Environ Exerc Physiol
results.text_hl: A double-blind randomized crossover comparison of 4 wk treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (100 mg/day), @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@ (100 mg/day), or matched placebo was performed in 12 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Emphysema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004646 @@@emphysema@@@.
